text: Elson José Dias Júnior (born 10 April 1991 in Minas Gerais, Brazil) is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays for Celaya on loan from Juárez. ==External links== * Elson José Dias Junior Statistics from Ascenso MX * SoccerWay Category:Liga MX players Category:Living people Category:1991 births Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Clube Atlético Votuporanguense players Category:Nacional Esporte Clube (MG) players Category:Sociedade Esportiva Matonense players Category:Oeste Futebol Clube players Category:Rio Claro Futebol Clube players Category:FC Juárez footballers Category:Club Celaya footballers Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:People from Minas Gerais Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Mexico Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:Association football midfielders
title: Elson José Dias Júnior
